name: boy / girls linen hat
description:
This linen hat is reversible. One side is charcoal and the other in black. A simple yet chic, modern hat for the little one. Suitable for toddlers and children. My model is 21months old with a head circumference of 19". She wears a size XS.

SIZE CHART GUIDE
(head circumference size)

XXS - 48cm / 19"
XS - 50cm / 19.5"
S - 52cm / 20.5"
M - 54cm / 21"
L - 56cm / 22"

SHIPPING
please allow up to 1 week for me to make your order. 3 hats can be mailed in one package for the shipping price of 1 hat. Please read my shop policy for more details.

Let me know if you have any questions. thanks!

name: pink tweed wool hat
description:
A simple yet chic, modern hat for the little one. Suitable for todders and children.  Handmade from pure wool, italy. Fully lined in citron linen.

name: original mixed media painting
description:
ORIGINAL MIXED MEDIA PAINTING

Untitled
Style • abstract, modern art
Year • 2013
Size • 23cm x 17cm (9' x 6.5")
Medium • gouache, paper and thread on 210gm acid free watercolour paper.
Colour • off white, brown, lilac grey

This abstract painting is a series exploring detail, texture and colour. Each piece intuitively made.

Unframed. Signed and dated behind.
Ships to you in a cellophane bag and rigid envelope


Please allow for slight colour variations between artwork and monitor.
Thanks!

© PAMELATANG 2013

name: essie blouse polka dot
description:
essie blouse

this loose fitting blouse is super comfy! pair with jeans, skinny pants, skirts or layered over simple dresses it can be tailored for different occasions.

features round neck with drop shoulder. sleeves fall at elbow. wide cuff. hand stitched details within. blouse tapers in towards hemline for a more flattering fit.

handmade from double layered cotton gauze (not see through). this is a beautiful fabric, available in denim with metallic blue dots, beige with white dots and taupe with silver dots. delicate yet very soft and comfortable to wear. length approx 24".

the essie blouse is a regular item in my shop, offered in limited edition fabrics and colours.

MADE TO ORDER IN SIZES - XS, S, M, L, XL

XS
Bust • 84cm / 33"
Waist • 64cm / 25"
Hip • 92cm / 36"

S
Bust • 89.5cm / 35"
Waist • 69cm / 27"
Hip • 97cm / 38"

M
Bust • 94cm / 37"
Waist • 74cm / 29"
Hip • 102cm / 40"

L
Bust • 99cm / 39"
Waist • 79cm / 31"
Hip • 107cm / 42"

XL
Bust • 104cm / 41"
Waist • 84cm / 33"
Hips • 112cm / 44

PLEASE EMAIL ME YOUR BUST, WAIST & HIP MEASUREMENT AFTER PLACING AN ORDER.

RECOMMENDED CARE
place clothing in a washing bag (or pillow case)
gentle cycle. cold machine wash. line dry flat.

name: yoga eye pillow
description:
One of a kind, this yoga eye pillow is handmade from soft cotton gauze and filled with organic french lavender, geranium, eucalyptus and flax seeds. The patterns featured on each pillow are unique with each piece. Uncut thread intentional.

Soft, comfortable and soothing, this pillow blocks out light and will help you to relax and relieve tired eyes and stress. 

Size - 21cm x 9cm (8.5" x 3.5")

name: 2 linen drawer sachets - organic french lavender
description:
linen drawer sachets

features subtle linear patterns with contrast stitching detail unique with each piece

these handmade linen sachets can be placed in your drawer and linen cabinet to repel silver fish and moths. they can also be placed in the bathroom, next to your bed and around your home to enjoy. filled only with organic french lavender.

lavender is also known to help you to relax, relieve headaches, sinus and insomnia.

measures approx.
3.5" x 5.5" (8.5cm x 13cm)

SHIPPING
i can send up to 4 linen sachets in one post bag for the same shipping price.

this listing is for 2 linen sachets.

name: 3 mocha silk eye pillows
description:
SILK EYE PILLOW

One of a kind, this eye pillow is handmade from pure silk and filled with organic french lavender and flax seeds. The front features quilted free style stitching. This detail will vary making each piece unique. Uncut threads are intentional.

Soft, comfortable and soothing, these pillows block out light and will help you to relax, relieve tired eyes and de-stress. May also be used for headaches, sinus, insomnia and yoga. This also makes a great gift for the bride and groom.

During summer, freeze in a zip lock bag to chill before use.

approximate size - 21cm x 9cm (8.5" x 3.5")

ships within 3-5 business days

combine your order to lower postage rates or receive free shipping on additional items.
check out my shop policy for details.
